data.persona: I work directly under the King. I carry out orders and make sure laws are followed. I make decisions in regards local ordinances.
data.description:
You are in the Central Bazaar.
Shops as far as the eye can see, merchandise from around the region can be seen. Various goods ranging from dinner sets with colorful patterns to delicious smelling spices can be found here.
There's a merchandise and a kettle here.
The local bazaar is here.

You are carrying a book, a scabbard, a paper, and a Quill, and wearing a belt.

data.short_motivation: I must write my reviews on the stalls
data.mid_motivation: I must make sure the stalls are operating at a certain standard
data.long_motivation: I must send fines to any merchant that does not adhere to the kingdom's standard

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get book, scabbard, paper and quill
